thumb.title: Human Anatomy Model
thumb.description: A woman stands next to a human anatomy model, speaking clearly and enthusiastically as she points to different body parts. Her tone is friendly and engaging, aiming to capture the children's attention. The children sit or stand nearby, watching intently, their eyes following her gestures. Some lean forward with curiosity, while others raise their hands to ask questions. The atmosphere is one of learning and discovery, as the woman explains how the organs work together inside the human body.#廣戸孝行
